description: The ‘HP Smart’ app is a tool that assists in managing HP printers by providing users with functionality such as printing and scanning from their devices. This application also helps users to set up printers, conduct troubleshooting, and access additional features specific to HP products. In this context, the installation of the ‘HP Smart’ app is triggered by the incorrect identification of printers, indicating that it is optimized for use with HP models. Although it serves as a resource for HP printer management, it does not directly resolve the underlying identification issue. Users can directly interact with the HP Smart app through the Microsoft Store to install or update as needed.
